title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty - Episode 16
description: With another accidental catastrophe averted, The Pine Guard catch their breath and split up to take care of some mid-Hunt business. Aubrey takes some magic lessons. Ned reflects on his larcenous past. Duck makes use of the In-fur-mary.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
